001
002package com.commercetools.compat;
003
004import static io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.ClientUtils.blockingWait;
005
006import java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException;
007import java.net.URI;
008import java.net.URLEncoder;
009import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
010import java.nio.file.Files;
011import java.time.Duration;
012import java.util.AbstractMap;
013import java.util.List;
014import java.util.Map;
015import java.util.Optional;
016import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
017import java.util.stream.Collectors;
018
019import io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereRequest;
020import io.sphere.sdk.http.*;
021import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
022import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.FileUtils;
023
024import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.EqualsBuilder;
025import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.HashCodeBuilder;
026
027public class CompatRequest<TResult> extends ApiMethod<CompatRequest<TResult>, TResult>
028        implements ClientRequestCommand<TResult> {
029
030    private final SphereRequest<?> request;
031    private final Class<TResult> resultClass;
032    private final String projectKey;
033
034    private CompatRequest(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final String projectKey, SphereRequest<?> request,
035            final Class<TResult> resultClass) {
036        super(apiHttpClient);
037        this.request = request;
038        this.projectKey = projectKey;
039        this.resultClass = resultClass;
040    }
041
042    private CompatRequest(CompatRequest<TResult> t) {
043        super(t);
044        this.request = t.request;
045        this.resultClass = t.resultClass;
046        this.projectKey = t.projectKey;
047    }
048
049    public static <TResult> CompatRequest<TResult> of(final ApiHttpClient client, final String projectKey,
050            final SphereRequest<?> request, final Class<TResult> resultClass) {
051        return new CompatRequest<>(client, projectKey, request, resultClass);
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    protected CompatRequest<TResult> copy() {
056        return new CompatRequest<>(this);
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    protected ApiHttpRequest buildHttpRequest() {
061
062        HttpRequest httpRequest = request.httpRequestIntent().toHttpRequest("/" + projectKey);
063        List<Map.Entry<String, String>> headers = httpRequest.getHeaders()
064                .getHeadersAsMap()
065                .entrySet()
066                .stream()
067                .flatMap(
068                    e -> e.getValue().stream().map(v -> new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<String, String>(e.getKey(), v) {
069                    }))
070                .collect(Collectors.toList());
071
072        final URI resolve = URI.create(httpRequest.getUrl());
073        return new ApiHttpRequest(ApiHttpMethod.valueOf(httpRequest.getHttpMethod().name()), resolve,
074            new ApiHttpHeaders(headers), Optional.ofNullable(httpRequest.getBody()).map(body -> {
075                if (body instanceof StringHttpRequestBody) {
076                    return ((StringHttpRequestBody) body).getString().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
077                }
078                if (body instanceof FormUrlEncodedHttpRequestBody) {
079                    return urlEncodedOf((FormUrlEncodedHttpRequestBody) body).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
080                }
081                if (body instanceof FileHttpRequestBody) {
082                    return FileUtils
083                            .executing(() -> Files.readAllBytes(((FileHttpRequestBody) body).getFile().toPath()));
084                }
085                throw new HttpException("Cannot interpret request " + httpRequest);
086            }).orElse(null));
087    }
088
089    private static String urlEncodedOf(final FormUrlEncodedHttpRequestBody body) {
090        return body.getParameters().stream().map(entry -> {
091            try {
092                return entry.getName() + "=" + URLEncoder.encode(entry.getValue(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8.toString());
093            }
094            catch (UnsupportedEncodingException e) {
095                throw new HttpException("Cannot encode request body " + body, e);
096            }
097        }).collect(Collectors.joining("&"));
098    }
099
100    @Override
101    public ApiHttpResponse<TResult> executeBlocking(final ApiHttpClient client, Duration timeout) {
102        return blockingWait(execute(client), timeout);
103    }
104
105    @Override
106    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<TResult>> execute(final ApiHttpClient client) {
107        return client.execute(this.createHttpRequest(), resultClass);
108    }
109
110    @Override
111    public boolean equals(Object o) {
112        if (this == o)
113            return true;
114
115        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass())
116            return false;
117
118        CompatRequest<?> request1 = (CompatRequest<?>) o;
119
120        return new EqualsBuilder().append(request, request1.request)
121                .append(resultClass, request1.resultClass)
122                .append(projectKey, request1.projectKey)
123                .isEquals();
124    }
125
126    @Override
127    public int hashCode() {
128        return new HashCodeBuilder(17, 37).append(request).append(resultClass).append(projectKey).toHashCode();
129    }
130}
